column1: Specifications: "Indoor/outdoor 4K PoE camera with 17 or 45 mm lens."
Wide aperture M4/3 f/1.2 prime lens included
*Not available when installed with its outdoor case."

"Dimensions": "Without mount: Ø80 x 89 mm (Ø3.1 x  3.5")
With mount: Ø80 x 153 mm (Ø3.1 x 6")
M. Zuiko Digital ED 17 mm PRO: Ø68.2 x 87 mm (Ø2.7 x 3.4")
M. Zuiko Digital ED 45 mm PRO: Ø70 x 84.9 mm (Ø2.8 x 3.3")
Outdoor case: Ø91.6 x 196.3 mm (Ø3.6 x 7.7")"

"Weight": "Without mount: 660 g (1.5 lb)
With mount: 820 g (1.8 lb)
M. Zuiko Digital ED 17 mm PRO: 390 g (0.9 lb)
M. Zuiko Digital ED 45 mm PRO: 410 g (0.9 lb)
Outdoor case: 510 g (1.1 lb)"
"Mount material": "Wall mount: aluminum alloy\nPole mount: aluminum alloy"
"Lens": "UVC-AI-DSLR: M. Zuiko Digital ED 17 mm ƒ/1.2 PRO\nUVC-AI-DSLR-LD: M. Zuiko Digital ED 45 mm ƒ/1.2 PRO"
"Ambient operating temperature": "-20 to 40° C (-4 to 104° F)"
"Microphone": "Yes* (Can be disabled) *Audio function will be disabled when using its outdoor case."
"Speaker": "Yes**Audio function will be disabled when using its outdoor case."
"Mobile app": "UniFi Protect iOS™ and Android™:  Version 1.7.0 and later"
